main event: A witness observed an unidentified object passing overhead intermittently, initially thought to be aircraft or possibly a balloon, with sightings recorded between 11:10 PM and 11:23 PM on August 21, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared dull red during the second pass, The sightings occurred approximately 20 miles southwest of Baltimore, MD, and 5 miles north of Baltimore at different times, The brightness of the object was reported to be three times that of Venus, The object traveled in a direction opposite to that of a satellite, No sound was reported from the object despite its close proximity.
sighted object: an unidentified object in the sky
witness description: the individual observing from their residence
